nimbodata.core.pg.engine module¶

Module encapsulates PG access at a certain permission level.

class nimbodata.core.pg.engine.Engine(user=None, drc=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Engine for PostgreSQL database.

close()[source]¶
conn_string[source]¶
execute(stmt, params=None)[source]¶

Execute the statement in a transaction, parameters optional.

execute_many(stmts, return_cursors=False)[source]¶

Execute multiple statements within a transaction.

Optionally return the cursors resulting from each.

mogrify(stmt, params=None)[source]¶

Combines statement and params to string for human use.

nimbodata.core.pg.select module¶

Module implements query functionality against Nimbodata.

class nimbodata.core.pg.select.Select[source]¶

Bases: nimbodata.core.pg.engine.Engine

A customized Postgres engine providing various query capabilities.

allowed_funcs = ['max', 'min', 'avg']¶
execute(stmt, params=None)[source]¶

Execute the SQL statement using the provided parameters.

Returns an array of a single column from a select query.

get_byrowid(viewid, ids, alias=False)[source]¶

Returns a row from a specified relation.

Module contents¶

Module implements all of the functionality to interact with PostgreSQL.
